name: Hippo Web Builder
short_description:
This project is in planning phase..
 
Build Jabiru Server Pages or Olingo Server Pages with Hippo Web Builder.
 
Hippo Web Builder is an Haskell Rad IDE for the web bundled with Apache Tomcat Server and Apache Webserver and Squid SQL Server. You can build high quaility Jsp.JET(Jabiru Server Pages) or Osp.JET(Olingo Server Pages)websites with Ajax Technology using the visual gui designer inside Hippo Web Builder for drawing and placing widgets and components on forms and then write code in the Hippo Haskell Language. Users can either choose the Apache Webserver + The Squid SQL Server to build and run Osp.JET web applications or choose the Apache Tomcat Server + The Squid SQL Server to build and run Jsp.JET pages.
 
more info about this project coming soon..
summary: An Visual Web IDE for the Hippo Haskell Language
